sentence.Network_en: Of all the great interest appertain to our country, that of union _ cordial.
sentence.Network_cn: 在我们国家的重大利益之中最为重要的是我们热情 、 可信.

sentence.Network_en: The responsibilities that appertain to parenthood were discussed at the meeting.
sentence.Network_cn: 会上讨论了父母应尽的职责.

sentence.Network_en: Clearly, however, these matters appertain as much to private economy as to the economy of whole nations.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是很明显, 这些问题关系到整个国家的组济,也在同样程度上关系到私人经济.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The duties and privilege appertain to the post have never is officially stated., 附属于这一职务的义务与权利从未被正式规定过.

list.abs: appendix 附录补遗附件appertaining documents 有关证件apple green 苹果绿
Forestry appertains to geography ., 森林学和地理学有关.
These figures appertain to last year ' s sales ., 这些数字指的是去年的销售额.
the island of Formosa , together with all islands appertaining or belonging to the said island of Formosa .台湾岛，连同所有岛屿的附属物都属于台湾。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French apertenir, from late Latin appertinere, from ad- 'to' + Latin pertinere 'to pertain'

means.word_mean: 1. be a part or attribute of
